Migration Notes

Simple Java Mail has changed quite a lot over the years and has been rolled out over two major released: 5 and 6. If you come from a version < 5.0.0, it is recommended to update to 5.0.0 first, before moving on to 6.0.0. Find the changes detailed by clicking on your target Simple Java Mail version.
